Detailed Description

Converts between XML and CollectorConfig. You can construct this with either the XML or a configuration, and then read off the other form.

The XML uses "references" to templates to reduce the size of the XML file. However, the configuration objects are kept separately, so that, for example, a field can be updated without affecting any other configuration objects.

Version:
Id
ConfigXml.java,v 1.4 2005/01/30 15:13:42 ilyad Exp

Member Function Documentation

void com::xacct::CRANE::collector::ConfigXml::addClientsElement (  Element  clientsElement,
Element  templatesElement
)  throws ConfigException [inline, private]
 

Add the clients (transmitters/transmitters) to the XML document, adding templates as needed. The <client> elements refer to templates via <tmplref> elements. As needed new <template> elements (with appropriate <globalref> elements) are added to the <templates>; and an appropraite reference is created.

Parameters:
clientsElement The <clients> element
templatesElement The <templates> element 
00497                            {
00498         int refCounter = 0;
00499         // templateToRefId maps TemplateConfig.getReferenceString() to reference id (from refCounter)
00500         HashMap templateToRefId = new HashMap();
00501 
00502         for (ListIterator connectionIter = collectorConfig.getConnectionConfigIterator();
00503              connectionIter.hasNext(); ) {
00504             ConnectionConfig cc = (ConnectionConfig)connectionIter.next();
00505             Element clientElement = addNewElement(clientsElement, XML_CLIENT);
00506 
00507             addElement(clientElement, XML_CLIENT_IPADDRESS,                 cc.getTransmitterAddress().getHostAddress());
00508             addElement(clientElement, XML_CLIENT_PORT,                      cc.getTransmitterPort());
00509             addElement(clientElement, XML_CLIENT_VERSION_PORT,              cc.getTransmitterVersionPort());
00510             addElement(clientElement, XML_CLIENT_VENDOR_STRING,             cc.getTransmitterVendorString());
00511             addElement(clientElement, XML_CLIENT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT,           cc.getConnectTimeout());
00512             addElement(clientElement, XML_CLIENT_CONNECT_RETRY_TIMEOUT,     cc.getConnectRetryTimeout());
00513             addElement(clientElement, XML_CLIENT_RECONNECT_INTERVAL,        cc.getReconnectInterval());
00514             addElement(clientElement, XML_CLIENT_CONNECT_ROUNDTRIP_TIMEOUT, cc.getConnectRoundtripTimeout());
00515             addElement(clientElement, XML_CLIENT_ACK_LOG_INTERVAL,          cc.getDataAckLogInterval());
00516             addElement(clientElement, XML_CLIENT_DESCRIPTION,               "" /*no method yet*/);
00517 
00518             Element sessionsElement = addNewElement(clientElement, XML_CLIENT_SESSIONS);
00519 
00520             for (ListIterator j = cc.getSessionConfigIterator(); j.hasNext(); ) {
00521                 SessionConfig sc = (SessionConfig)j.next();
00522 
00523                 Element sessionElement = addNewElement(sessionsElement, XML_CLIENT_SESSION);
00524 
00525                 addElement(sessionElement, XML_CLIENT_SESSION_ID,           sc.getId());
00526                 addElement(sessionElement, XML_CLIENT_SESSION_NAME,         sc.getName()) ;
00527                 addElement(sessionElement, XML_CLIENT_SESSION_DESCRIPTION,  sc.getDescription());
00528                 Element sessionTemplates = addNewElement(sessionElement, XML_CLIENT_SESSION_TEMPLATES);
00529 
00530                 // adding this template's template information (template id and 'used fields' info)
00531                 for (ListIterator k = sc.getTemplateConfigIterator(); k.hasNext(); ) {
00532                     TemplateConfig tc =  (TemplateConfig)k.next();
00533 
00534                     String templateRefString = tc.getReferenceString();
00535                     String templateRefId = (String)templateToRefId.get(templateRefString);
00536 
00537                     if (templateRefId == null) {
00538                         addTemplate(++refCounter, templateRefString, tc, templateToRefId,
00539                                     templatesElement);
00540                     }
00541                     Element sessionTemplate = addNewElement(sessionTemplates, XML_CLIENT_SESSION_TEMPLATE);
00542                     addElement(sessionTemplate, XML_CLIENT_SESSION_TEMPLATE_REF, refCounter);
00543                 }
00544             }
00545         }
00546 
00547         refCounter = addUnusedTemplates(refCounter, collectorConfig.getConnectionConfigIterator(),
00548                                         templateToRefId, templatesElement);
00549     }

void com::xacct::CRANE::collector::ConfigXml::addTemplate (  int  refCounter,
String  templateRefString,
TemplateConfig  tc,
HashMap  templateToRefId,
Element  templatesElement
)  throws ConfigException [inline, private]
  

00580                            {
00581         templateToRefId.put(templateRefString, String.valueOf(refCounter));
00582 
00583         Element templateElement = addNewElement(templatesElement, XML_TEMPLATE);
00584 
00585         addElement(templateElement, XML_GLOBAL_TEMPLATE_REF,      refCounter);
00586         addElement(templateElement, XML_TEMPLATE_ID,              tc.getId());
00587         addElement(templateElement, XML_TEMPLATE_DESC ,           tc.getDescription());
00588         addElement(templateElement, XML_TEMPLATE_STATUS_RESPONSE, tc.isForStatusResponse());
00589 
00590         Element templateFields = addNewElement(templateElement, XML_CLIENT_SESSION_TEMPLATE_FIELDS);
00591 
00592         // adding this templates 'template information' (template id and 'used fields' info)
00593         for (ListIterator n = tc.getFieldIterator(); n.hasNext(); ) {
00594             FieldConfig fc = (FieldConfig)n.next();
00595 
00596             Element templateField = addNewElement(templateFields, XML_CLIENT_SESSION_TEMPLATE_FIELD);
00597 
00598             addElement(templateField, XML_CRANE_KEY_ID,    fc.getId());
00599             addElement(templateField, XML_FIELD_USED,      fc.isEnabledForOutput());
00600             addElement(templateField, XML_CRANE_KEY_NAME,  fc.getName());
00601             addElement(templateField, XML_CRANE_KEY_LABEL, fc.getLabel());
00602             addElement(templateField, XML_CRANE_KEY_HELP,  fc.getHelp());
00603             addElement(templateField, XML_CRANE_KEY_TYPE,  fc.getTypeId());
00604 
00605             if (fc.getFieldDesc() != null) {
00606                 addElement(templateField, XML_XACCT_FIELD_LABEL, fc.getFieldDesc().getLabel());
00607                 addElement(templateField, XML_XACCT_FIELD_TYPE,  fc.getFieldDesc().getFieldType().getLabel());
00608                 try {
00609                     addElement(templateField, XML_XACCT_FIELD_ID,    fc.getFieldDesc().getPrimitiveID());
00610                 } catch (InvalidFieldDescriptorException ex) {
00611                     throw new ConfigException(ex);
00612                 }
00613             }
00614         }
00615     }

int com::xacct::CRANE::collector::ConfigXml::addUnusedTemplates (  int  refCounter,
ListIterator  connectionIter,
HashMap  templateToRefId,
Element  templatesElement
)  throws ConfigException [inline, private]
  

00553                            {
00554         while (connectionIter.hasNext()) {
00555             ConnectionConfig cc = (ConnectionConfig)connectionIter.next();
00556             for (ListIterator sessionIter = cc.getSessionConfigIterator();
00557                  sessionIter.hasNext(); ) {
00558                 SessionConfig sc = (SessionConfig)sessionIter.next();
00559                 for (ListIterator tmplIter = sc.getTemplateConfigIterator();
00560                      tmplIter.hasNext(); ) {
00561                     TemplateConfig tmpl = (TemplateConfig)tmplIter.next();
00562                     if (tmpl != null) {
00563                         String templateRefString = tmpl.getReferenceString();
00564                         if (! templateToRefId.containsKey(templateRefString)) {
00565                             addTemplate(++refCounter, templateRefString,
00566                                         tmpl, templateToRefId, templatesElement);
00567                         }
00568                     }
00569                 }
00570             }
00571         }
00572 
00573         return refCounter;
00574     }

final void com::xacct::CRANE::collector::ConfigXml::configToXml (   )  throws ConfigException [inline, private]
  

00468                            {
00469         Element root = xml.getRootElement();
00470 
00471         Element clientsElement = addNewElement(root, XML_CLIENTS);
00472 
00473         Element templatesElement = addNewElement(root, XML_TEMPLATES);
00474 
00475         addElement(root, XML_CONFIGURATION_VERSION, collectorConfig.getConfigurationVersion());
00476         addElement(root, XML_SERVER_IPADDRESS,      collectorConfig.getCollectorAddress().getHostAddress());
00477         addElement(root, XML_SERVER_PORT,           collectorConfig.getCollectorConnectPortId());
00478         addElement(root, XML_SERVER_ACK_INTERVAL,   collectorConfig.getAckInterval());
00479         addElement(root, XML_SERVER_START_INTERVAL, collectorConfig.getCollectorStartInterval());
00480         addElement(root, XML_IS_DEBUG_LEVEL_USED,   m_isDebugLevelUsed);
00481         addElement(root, XML_NO_DATA_KEEP_ALIVE_INTERVAL, collectorConfig.getNoDataKeepAliveInterval());
00482 
00483         addClientsElement(clientsElement, templatesElement);
00484     }

00195 
00196         while (i.hasNext()) {
00197             Element client = (Element)i.next();
00198 
00199             String clientIP                   = extractStr(client, XML_CLIENT_IPADDRESS);
00200             int clientPort                    = extractInt(client, XML_CLIENT_PORT);
00201             int clientVersionPort             = extractInt(client, XML_CLIENT_VERSION_PORT);
00202             String clientVendorString         = extractStr(client, XML_CLIENT_VENDOR_STRING);
00203             int clientConnectTimeout          = extractInt(client, XML_CLIENT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT);
00204             int clientReconnectInterval       = extractInt(client, XML_CLIENT_RECONNECT_INTERVAL);
00205             int clientConnectRetryTimeout     = extractInt(client, XML_CLIENT_CONNECT_RETRY_TIMEOUT);
00206             int clientConnectRoundtripTimeout = extractInt(client, XML_CLIENT_CONNECT_ROUNDTRIP_TIMEOUT);
00207             int clientConnectDataLogInterval  = extractInt(client, XML_CLIENT_ACK_LOG_INTERVAL);
00208             String clientDescription          = extractStr(client, XML_CLIENT_DESCRIPTION);
00209 
00210             Element sessions= client.getChild(XML_CLIENT_SESSIONS);
00211             List sessionList = (List)sessions.getChildren(XML_CLIENT_SESSION);
00212             ArrayList sessionConfigList = new ArrayList(sessionList.size());
00213 
00214             extractSessionList(root, sessionList.iterator(), sessionConfigList, fieldFactory,
00215                                ExtendedInetAddress.andPortToString(clientIP, clientPort));
00216 
00217             try {
00218                 // Can throw ConfigException:
00219                 connectionConfigList.add(
00220                     new ConnectionConfig(
00221                         new ExtendedInetAddress(clientIP), // transmitter (client) address
00222                         clientPort,
00223                         clientVersionPort,
00224                         clientVendorString,
00225                         clientConnectTimeout,
00226                         clientReconnectInterval,
00227                         clientConnectRetryTimeout,
00228                         clientConnectRoundtripTimeout,
00229                         clientConnectDataLogInterval,
00230                         sessionConfigList));
00231             } catch (UnknownHostException uhe) {
00232                 throw new ConfigException(uhe);
00233             }
00234         }
00235     }

void com::xacct::CRANE::collector::ConfigXml::extractFields (  Iterator  n,
ArrayList  fieldList,
FieldDescriptorFactory  fieldFactory
)  throws ConfigException [inline, private]
 

Get the fields into a list.

Parameters:
i templatesField.iterator()
fieldList output
fieldFactory constructor for fields
Exceptions:
ConfigException Something wrong in the XML 
00351                                {
00352         while (n.hasNext()) {
00353             Element tmplField = (Element)n.next();
00354             int fieldId       = extractInt( tmplField, XML_CRANE_KEY_ID);
00355             String CRANEName  = extractStr( tmplField, XML_CRANE_KEY_NAME);
00356             String CRANELabel = extractStr( tmplField, XML_CRANE_KEY_LABEL);
00357             String CRANEHelp  = extractStr( tmplField, XML_CRANE_KEY_HELP);
00358             int CRANETypeId   = extractInt( tmplField, XML_CRANE_KEY_TYPE);
00359             boolean isUsed    = extractBool(tmplField, XML_FIELD_USED);
00360 
00361             String xacctLabel = null;
00362             String xacctType  = null;
00363 
00364             try {
00365                 xacctLabel = extractStr(tmplField, XML_XACCT_FIELD_LABEL);
00366                 xacctType  = extractStr(tmplField, XML_XACCT_FIELD_TYPE);
00367             } catch(NullPointerException NPE) {
00368                 fieldList.add(new FieldConfig(fieldId, CRANETypeId, CRANELabel,
00369                                               CRANEHelp, isUsed));
00370                 continue;
00371             } catch (NumberFormatException NFE) {
00372                 fieldList.add(new FieldConfig(fieldId, CRANETypeId, CRANELabel,
00373                                               CRANEHelp, isUsed));
00374                 continue;
00375             }
00376 
00377             FieldDescriptor fd = null;
00378             try {
00379                 fd = fieldFactory.createFieldDescriptor(
00380                     FieldType.getFieldType(xacctType),
00381                     stripFieldNamespace(xacctLabel));
00382 
00383                 if (fd == null) {
00384                     throw new ConfigException("Unable to create field descriptor, the retrieved field was null, "+
00385                                               "unable to continue extracting fields; field: " +
00386                                               xacctLabel);
00387                 }
00388             } catch (InvalidFieldLabelException e) {
00389                 throw new ConfigException("Unable to create field descriptor (invalid field label) for field: " +
00390                                           xacctLabel + ": " + e);
00391             } catch (FieldRegistrationException e) {
00392                 throw new ConfigException("Unable to create field descriptor (registration error) for field: " +
00393                                           xacctLabel + ": " + e);
00394             }
00395 
00396             fieldList.add(new FieldConfig(fieldId, CRANETypeId, CRANELabel,
00397                                           CRANEHelp, isUsed, fd));
00398         }
00399     }

static int com::xacct::CRANE::collector::ConfigXml::extractInt (  Element  root,
String  elementName,
int  defaultValue
)  throws ConfigException [inline, static, protected]
  

00422                                {
00423         String value = root.getChildText(elementName);
00424         try {
00425             return (value == null) ? defaultValue : Integer.parseInt(value);
00426         } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
00427             throw new ConfigException("Invalid element number for " + elementName +
00428                                       ": " + value + ": " + e);
00429         }
00430     }

00311                                {
00312         Element templates = root.getChild(XML_TEMPLATES);
00313         List templateList = (List)templates.getChildren(XML_TEMPLATE);
00314         ArrayList templateConfigList = new ArrayList(templateList.size());
00315 
00316         for (Iterator i = templateList.iterator(); i.hasNext(); ) {
00317             Element template = (Element)i.next();
00318 
00319             String globalTemplateRef = template.getChildText(XML_GLOBAL_TEMPLATE_REF);
00320             if (! globalTemplateRef.equals(templateRef)) {
00321                 continue;
00322             }
00323 
00324             int templateId = extractInt(template, XML_TEMPLATE_ID);
00325 
00326             String templateDescription     =  extractStr(template, XML_TEMPLATE_DESC);
00327             boolean templateStatusResponse = extractBool(template, XML_TEMPLATE_STATUS_RESPONSE);
00328 
00329             Element templatesFields = template.getChild(XML_CLIENT_SESSION_TEMPLATE_FIELDS);
00330             List templatesField = (List)templatesFields.getChildren(XML_CLIENT_SESSION_TEMPLATE_FIELD);
00331 
00332             ArrayList fieldList = new ArrayList(templatesField.size());
00333 
00334             extractFields(templatesField.iterator(), fieldList, fieldFactory);
00335 
00336             return new TemplateConfig(templateId, fieldList,
00337                                       templateDescription, templateStatusResponse);
00338         }
00339 
00340         return null;
00341     }

final void com::xacct::CRANE::collector::ConfigXml::xmlToConfig (  FieldDescriptorFactory  fieldFactory  )  throws ConfigException [inline, private]
  

00128                                {
00129         Element root = xml.getRootElement();
00130 
00131         String configVersion     = root.getChildText(XML_CONFIGURATION_VERSION).trim();
00132         String serverIPAddress   = root.getChildText(XML_SERVER_IPADDRESS).trim();
00133         ExtendedInetAddress serverExtendedAddress = null;
00134         try {
00135             serverExtendedAddress = new ExtendedInetAddress(serverIPAddress);
00136         } catch(UnknownHostException uhe) {
00137             throw new ConfigException(uhe);
00138         }
00139         int serverPort           =  extractInt(root, XML_SERVER_PORT);
00140 
00141         // If the server (collector) IP address isn't given, let's try
00142         // to give it a real value. This is a bit of a kludge; but we
00143         // want to ensure that the XML has something in it, for
00144         // debugging purposes (otherwise, we aren't 100% sure how the
00145         // address is resolved on multi-homed machines).
00146 
00147         int serverAckInterval    =  extractInt(root, XML_SERVER_ACK_INTERVAL);
00148         int serverStartInterval  =  extractInt(root, XML_SERVER_START_INTERVAL);
00149         m_isDebugLevelUsed       = extractBool(root, XML_IS_DEBUG_LEVEL_USED);
00150 
00151         ArrayList connectionConfigList = extractClients(root, fieldFactory);
00152 
00153         collectorConfig = new CollectorConfig(
00154             configVersion,
00155             serverExtendedAddress,
00156             serverPort,
00157             serverAckInterval,
00158             serverStartInterval,
00159             connectionConfigList);
00160 
00161         collectorConfig.setNoDataKeepAliveInterval(extractInt(root, XML_NO_DATA_KEEP_ALIVE_INTERVAL,
00162                                                               Constants.DEFAULT_NO_DATA_KEEP_ALIVE_INTERVAL));
00163     }
